title: How to Do Well in School & Find the Perfect Balance
description:
Install Raid for Free ✅ IOS: https://clcr.me/TechWithTim_ios ✅ ANDROID: https://clcr.me/TechWithTim_android ✅ PC: https://clcr.me/TechWithTim_pc and get a special starter pack 💥 Available only for the next 30 days

In this video I discuss how to do well in school while maintaining a healthy and balanced lifestyle. I will share tips and advice for students and how you can apply them to be successful. These tips and advice will be specific to university or college students but of course can be applied to students in other types of school. 

📖 Happiness Advantage: https://www.amazon.ca/Happiness-Advantage-Principles-Psychology-Performance/dp/0307591549
